About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Full stack JS Developer using Express, React, Node.js with an emphasis on Frontend web development and mobile using React and React Native. Experienced in building CRUD applications, RESTful APIs using Node.js and express, User Auth and oAuth with Passport JS and Firebase. Common libraries of use: Axios, Redux, Expressm body-parser, socket.io, react-router, redux-thunk. Common use of UI libraries: Bootstrap 4, React-Bootstrap, MaterializeCSS, Material-UI, Elemental-UI and Native-Base for React Native

EXPERIENCE

Auto Recycler Association of Australia

Software Developer

Aug 2019 - Present

Involved in the Takata Airbag Salvage Program for Australia by establishing, implementing, and managing the components for the development infrastructure and inventory management for the project.

    Notable accomplishments:
  • Developed Mobile Application for both Android and iOS Which are used to process 20,000+ Airbags.
  • Developed a internal CRM which is used for keeping records of calls and visits made to any business.
  • Created an automation process for inventory management of the affected airbags which reduce the manual work by half.
  • Also developed a mobile application which is used for placing bids for a buying a salvage car
Technologies Used: jQuery, React Native, React JS, Python, Django, API, Shell scripting, Azure SQL Database, Microsoft Azure, MySQL, RESTful Web Services, Payment Integration & Gateways.
